sn46.40:1.1: “Mendicants, these five hindrances are destroyers of sight, vision, and knowledge. They block wisdom, they’re on the side of anguish, and they don’t lead to extinguishment.
sn46.40:1.3: Sensual desire, ill will, dullness and drowsiness, restlessness and remorse, and doubt.
sn46.40:1.8: These five hindrances are destroyers of sight, vision, and knowledge. They block wisdom, they’re on the side of anguish, and they don’t lead to extinguishment.
sn46.40:2.1: These seven awakening factors are creators of vision and knowledge. They grow wisdom, they’re on the side of solace, and they lead to extinguishment.
sn46.40:2.3: The awakening factors of mindfulness, investigation of principles, energy, rapture, tranquility, immersion, and equanimity.
sn46.40:2.4: These seven awakening factors are creators of vision and knowledge. They grow wisdom, they’re on the side of solace, and they lead to extinguishment.”
